hoipolloi
Class VerticalFlowLayout

java.lang.Object
  hoipolloi.VerticalFlowLayout
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.LayoutManager, java.io.Serializable
public class VerticalFlowLayout
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.LayoutManager, java.io.Serializable

A vertical flow layout is similar to a flow layuot but it layouts the components vertically instead of horizontally.

Since:
March 24, 2001
Author:
Vassili Dzuba
See Also:
